name: eedomus
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Voice control your eedomus devices through Amazon Echo/Alexa.

This skill requires an eedomus home automation controller and at least one associated device to be controlled.

Add this skill from the Alexa app, then configure your amazon email address from the eedomus portal, then click "Discover devices" on the "Smart Home section" of your Alexa app.

Learn more on http://doc.eedomus.com/en/index.php/Eedomus_and_Amazon_Echo
